1 var PacketReader = require('../PacketReader'),
  2   PacketWriter = require('../PacketWriter'),
  3   assert = require('assert');
  4 
  5 var bValue = 0xEF; //=239
  6 var cValue = 'x';
  7 var shortValue = 0x70;
  8 var iValue = 0x7ABC;
  9 var shortValueSigned = 0x8001;
 10 var iValueSigned = 0x80000001;
 11 var sValue = '0987654321';
 12 var dValue = new Date(2012, 1, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
 13 
 14 function createPacketReader(bytes) {
 15   var buffer = new Buffer(bytes);
 16   var parser = new PacketReader();
 17 
 18   parser._append(buffer);
 19 
 20   return parser;
 21 }
 22 
 23 function testByte(value) {
 24   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 25   packetWriter._writeByte(value);
 26   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 27   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 28 
 29   var newValue = packetReader._parseByte();
 30   assert.equal(newValue, value);
 31 }
 32 
 33 function testChar(value) {
 34   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 35   packetWriter._writeChar(value);
 36   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 37   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 38 
 39   var newValue = packetReader._parseChar();
 40   assert.equal(newValue, value);
 41 }
 42 
 43 function testShort(value) {
 44   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 45   packetWriter._writeShort(value);
 46   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 47   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 48 
 49   var newValue = packetReader._parseShort();
 50   assert.equal(newValue, value);
 51 }
 52 
 53 function testShortSigned(value, expectedValue) {
 54   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 55   packetWriter._writeShort(value);
 56   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 57   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 58 
 59   var newValue = packetReader._parseShort();
 60   assert.equal(newValue, expectedValue);
 61 }
 62 
 63 function testInt(value) {
 64   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 65   packetWriter._writeInt(value);
 66   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 67   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 68 
 69   var newValue = packetReader._parseInt();
 70   assert.equal(newValue, value);
 71 }
 72 
 73 function testIntSigned(value, expectedValue) {
 74   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 75   packetWriter._writeInt(value);
 76   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 77   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 78 
 79   var newValue = packetReader._parseInt();
 80   assert.equal(newValue, expectedValue);
 81 }
 82 
 83 function testDate(year, month, day) {
 84   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 85   packetWriter._writeDate(year, month, day);
 86   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 87   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
 88 
 89   var newValue = packetReader._parseDate();
 90   assert.equal(newValue.getFullYear(), year);
 91   assert.equal(newValue.getMonth(), month);
 92   assert.equal(newValue.getDate(), day);
 93 }
 94 
 95 function testTime(hour, min, sec) {
 96   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 97   packetWriter._writeTime(hour, min, sec);
 98   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 99   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
100 
101   var newValue = packetReader._parseTime();
102   assert.equal(newValue.getHours(), hour);
103   assert.equal(newValue.getMinutes(), min);
104   assert.equal(newValue.getSeconds(), sec);
105 }
106 
107 function testDateTime(year, month, day, hour, min, sec, msec) {
108   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
109   packetWriter._writeDateTime(year, month, day, hour, min, sec, msec);
110   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
111   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
112 
113   var newValue = packetReader._parseDateTime();
114   assert.equal(newValue.getFullYear(), year);
115   assert.equal(newValue.getMonth(), month);
116   assert.equal(newValue.getDate(), day);
117   assert.equal(newValue.getHours(), hour);
118   assert.equal(newValue.getMinutes(), min);
119   assert.equal(newValue.getSeconds(), sec);
120   assert.equal(newValue.getMilliseconds(), msec);
121 }
122 
123 function testTimestamp(year, month, day, hour, min, sec) {
124   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
125   packetWriter._writeTimestamp(year, month, day, hour, min, sec);
126   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
127   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
128 
129   var newValue = packetReader._parseTimeStamp();
130   assert.equal(newValue.getFullYear(), year);
131   assert.equal(newValue.getMonth(), month);
132   assert.equal(newValue.getDate(), day);
133   assert.equal(newValue.getHours(), hour);
134   assert.equal(newValue.getMinutes(), min);
135   assert.equal(newValue.getSeconds(), sec);
136 }
137 
138 function testString(value) {
139   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
140   packetWriter._writeNullTerminatedString(value);
141   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
142   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
143 
144   var len = packetReader._parseInt();
145   var newValue = packetReader._parseNullTerminatedString(len);
146   assert.equal(newValue, value);
147 }
148 
149 function testFixedLengthString(value) {
150   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
151   packetWriter._writeFixedLengthString(value, 'x', 15);
152   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
153   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
154 
155   var newValue = packetReader._parseString(15);
156   assert.equal(newValue, value + 'xxxxx');
157 }
158 
159 function testFiller() {
160   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
161   packetWriter._writeFiller(5, 'x');
162   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
163   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
164 
165   var newValue = packetReader._parseString(5);
166   assert.equal(newValue, 'xxxxx');
167 
168   packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
169   packetWriter._writeFiller(5, 120);
170   packetReader = new PacketReader();
171   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
172 
173   newValue = packetReader._parseString(5);
174   assert.equal(newValue, 'xxxxx');
175 }
176 
177 function testAllTypes(value1, value2, value3) {
178   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
179   packetWriter._writeByte(value1);
180   packetWriter._writeInt(value2);
181   packetWriter._writeNullTerminatedString(value3);
182   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
183   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
184 
185   var newValue1 = packetReader._parseByte();
186   assert.equal(newValue1, value1);
187 
188   var newValue2 = packetReader._parseInt();
189   assert.equal(newValue2, value2);
190 
191   var len = packetReader._parseInt();
192   var newValue3 = packetReader._parseNullTerminatedString(len);
193   assert.equal(newValue3, value3);
194 }
195 
196 function testPacketReaderBytes() {
197   var packetReader = createPacketReader([1, 2]);
198 
199   var newValue = packetReader._parseBytes(2);
200   assert.equal(newValue[0], 1);
201   assert.equal(newValue[1], 2);
202 }
203 
204 function testPacketReaderBuffer() {
205   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
206   packetWriter._writeBuffer(new Buffer([1, 2]));
207 
208   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
209   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
210   var newValue = packetReader._parseBuffer(2);
211   assert.equal(newValue[0], 1);
212   assert.equal(newValue[1], 2);
213 }
214 
215 function testLong(value) {
216   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
217   packetWriter._writeLong(value);
218   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
219   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
220   var newValue = packetReader._parseLong();
221   assert.equal(newValue, value);
222 }
223 
224 function testFloat(value) {
225   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
226   packetWriter._writeFloat(value);
227   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
228   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
229   var newValue = packetReader._parseFloat();
230   assert.equal(newValue, value);
231 }
232 
233 function testDouble(value) {
234   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
235   packetWriter._writeDouble(value);
236   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
237   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
238   var newValue = packetReader._parseDouble();
239   assert.equal(newValue, value);
240 }
241 
242 function testNumeric(value) {
243   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
244   packetWriter._writeNumeric(value);
245   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
246   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
247   var length = packetReader._parseInt();
248   var newValue = packetReader._parseNumeric(length);
249   assert.equal(newValue, value);
250 }
251 
252 function testObject() {
253   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
254   packetWriter._writeBuffer(new Buffer([0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 2]));
255   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
256   packetReader.write(packetWriter._toBuffer());
257   var newValue = packetReader._parseObject();
258   assert.equal(newValue, 'OID:@0|1|2');
259 }
260 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
261 
262 console.log('Unit test ' + module.filename.toString() + ' started...');
263 
264 //Test integer-types
265 testByte(bValue);
266 testShort(shortValue);
267 testInt(iValue);
268 
269 //Test signed integer-types
270 testShortSigned(shortValueSigned, -32767);
271 //testShortSigned(shortValueSigned, -1);
272 testIntSigned(iValueSigned, -2147483647);
273 //testIntSigned(iValueSigned, -1);
274 
275 //Test strings
276 testChar(cValue);
277 testString(sValue);
278 testFixedLengthString(sValue);
279 
280 //Test dates
281 testDate(dValue.getFullYear(), dValue.getMonth(), dValue.getDate());
282 testTime(dValue.getHours(), dValue.getMinutes(), dValue.getSeconds());
283 testDateTime(dValue.getFullYear(), dValue.getMonth(), dValue.getDate(),
284   dValue.getHours(), dValue.getMinutes(), dValue.getSeconds(), dValue.getMilliseconds());
285 testTimestamp(dValue.getFullYear(), dValue.getMonth(), dValue.getDate(),
286   dValue.getHours(), dValue.getMinutes(), dValue.getSeconds());
287 
288 //Other tests
289 testAllTypes(bValue, iValue, sValue);
290 testPacketReaderBytes();
291 testPacketReaderBuffer();
292 testFiller();
293 
294 testLong(Math.pow(2, 53) - 152156);
295 testLong(Math.pow(2, 53) + 100);//overflow
296 testFloat(4.5);
297 testDouble(3.14);
298 testNumeric(1.5);
299 testObject();
300 
301 console.log('Unit test ended OK.');
